title: [Moot Hall, Landing]
description: You are on the landing of the second story of the Moot Hall.  The dust on the bannister and the cobwebs in the corner of the room indicate this part of the building does not see many visitors, in spite of what the sign on the varnished modwir door here says.

Sunlight filters in through several windows throughout the landing of the second story of Moot Hall.  The bannisters are a polished oak that run the length of the upstairs, and sweep down the staircase leading to the lobby.  A sign is displayed on a varnished modwir door.

Moonlight filters in through several windows throughout the landing of the second story of Moot Hall.  The bannisters are a polished oak that run the length of the upstairs, and sweep down the staircase leading to the lobby.  A sign is displayed on a varnished modwir door.

Sunlight filters in through several windows throughout the landing of the second story of Moot Hall.  The bannisters are a polished oak that run the length of the upstairs, and sweep down the staircase leading to the lobby.  A sign is displayed on a varnished modwir door with a large vertebral bone-framed blackboard hanging next to it.
